Uses of Package
org.domainobject.animation.sp.arrayobject

  • Packages that use org.domainobject.animation.sp.arrayobject 
    Package Description
    org.domainobject.animation.sp.arrayobject  
  • Classes in org.domainobject.animation.sp.arrayobject used by org.domainobject.animation.sp.arrayobject 
    Class and Description
    _Color3
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of representing a 3-component color (rgb).
    _Color4
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of representing a 4-component color (rgba).
    _IndexedMemory
    Indexed memory is the type of memory you would use if you want to feed indexed array buffers to your shader program using glDrawElements.
    _IndexedMemoryFast
    A type of indexed memory that indexes array objects the moment you add them.
    _IndexedMemoryLazy
    A type of indexed memory that indexes the array objects stored in it only when it is request to burn the array buffer and element array buffer.
    _Memory
    An object that stores array objects and copies them to OpenGL buffers.
    _Normal 
    _Pos3 
    _Pos4 
    _Texture 
    ArrayObject
    ArrayObject is the abstract base class for all OpenGL objects that wrap a small array of float elements, like vectors, vertices and matrices.
    Color3
    A 3-component vertex class suitable for specifying colors without an alpha component.
    Color4
    A 4-component vertex class suitable for specifying colors.
    MemoryException 
    NonIndexedMemory 
    Normal 
    Pos3
    A 3-component vertex class suitable for specifying 3D coordinates.
    Pos3Color3
    A 6-component vertex class suitable for specifying a position (first 3 slots) and a color (last three slots).
    Pos4
    A 4-component vertex class suitable for specifying 4D coordinates.
    Pos4Color4
    An 8-component vertex class suitable for specifying a position (first four slots) and a color (last four slots).
    Pos4Color4Texture
    An 10-component vertex class suitable for specifying a position (first four slots) a color (next four slots) and two texture coordinates (last two slots).
    Pos4NormalTexture
    A 9-component vertex class suitable for specifying a position (first four slots) a normal (next three slots) and two texture coordinates (last two slots).
    ShaderInput 
    Vertex
